name: 3D Buttons
tagline: A collection of 3D buttons made with CSS. Easy to use, configure and edit to your desire
body: #3D Buttons 3D Buttons gives you an variaty of nice looking conversion magnet buttons to place on your website. ##Usage To use 3D Buttons on your website, you first need to implement the 3d-buttons.css stylesheet between your ``. ```html ``` After that you can use the classes `.btn .btn-[color] .btn-[size]` ### Button colors The following button color classes are available at the moment ```css .btn-red .btn-blue .btn-darkblue .btn-turquoise .btn-green .btn-yellow .btn-pink .btn-purple .btn-orange .btn-black .btn-brown .btn-white .btn-gray ``` ### Button sizes ```css .btn-xs .btn-sm .btn-md .btn-lg .btn-xl .btn-xxl .btn-hu ``` ## Examples ```HTML Small Red Button Medium Green Button Large Brown Button Biggest Darkblue button ``` ## Contributing When contributing add an codepen with a example. [Donations](http://www.jeroensormani.com/donate/) are always welcome and appreciated!
